name: loop

delimiters.description: Character(s) that separates items in list

step.description: Step by which to increment or decrement the index value.

index.description: Index value. ColdFusion sets it to from value and increments or decrements by step value, until it equals to value.

endrow.description: Last row of query that is included in the loop.

startrow.description: First row of query that is included in the loop.

list.description: A list, variable, or file name; contains a list

description:
Looping is a very powerful programming technique that lets you repeat a set of instructions or 
  display output repeatedly until one or more conditions are met. cfloop supports five types of loops.
